content: न्यस्त {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Cast down, thrown or laid down, deposited. {@--2@} Put in, inserted, applied; न्यस्ताक्षराः <ls>Ku. 1. 7.</ls> {@--3@} Depicted, drawn; चित्रन्यस्त. {@--4@} Consigned, delivered or transferred to; <ls>V. 5. 17</ls>; <ls>Ratn. 1. 10.</ls> {@--5@} Leaning, resting on. {@--6@} Given up, set aside, resigned. {@--7@} Mystically touched, <ls>Māl. 5. 2.</ls>
